name: Urban Massacre
description:
You are the last survivor in this night city. It was completely occupied by the walking dead. Your goal is to collect all the necessary supplies to leave this damned place. Armed with one pistol, you have to fight your way through crowds of zombies and collect things from the list. Show courage and tactics to survive and complete the combat mission.

Urban Massacre is a zombie horror shooter where you collect items scattered throughout the town. Be careful because there is only one life and in case of death you will have to start over.

Game Features:
- Zombie survival
- One life
- Search for objects
